1.content:
Kaylee Jacobson's parents were away. As one or both of them were usually present most nights, this offered the 17 year old teenager a rare opportunity of freedom. She wasted no time in calling her three closest friends over for an impromptu slumber party. The four of them had been planning on getting together like this for a while, but until now they hadn't had the chance. The group hadn't had a chance to get wild in a long time, so this had been a long time coming.

         At school that day, the four had decided that the night's activity would be strip poker. Despite being close friends, most of them had never seen the others in so much as underwear before. Kaylee certainly hadn't. So it seemed like a bit of naughty fun. What would come of it? None of them knew, and that's the way they liked it. The night was young and everything was ready.

Kaylee Jacobson: a rather pretty high school junior. Her hair is a shoulder length rich, dark brown, and her chest an ample c-cup. She's sociable and sometimes a bit bratty, but not overly bitchy about it. She's pretty and she knows it, but she is the most loyal of friends, and nice to those that know her.
Clothing: white tennis shoes, socks, a white outer blouse, a light pink under-blouse, a pair of stylish slim cut jeans, black lace bra, black lace panties.

Zoe Adams: A fun-loving, busty redhead. Zoe is a bit on the ditzy and flirty side, but she's nevertheless friendly. She is likely the most comfortable with her body of all the girls. She is an easy d-cup, and she wears her hair in a ponytail.
Clothing: high heeled shoes, black stockings, silk button-up shirt, a knee-length black skirt, hot pink bra, hot pink thong.

Tanya Jackson: An athletic, intelligent black teen. Tanya is a scholar athlete and ivy league hopeful. Despite running track, she still has a very feminine frame with c-cup breasts and a very shapely ass. She's likely the most uptight of the group when it comes to matters like this. Despite her shyness, though, she is dedicated and can get fiercely competitive.
Clothing: fur-lined boots, athletic socks, white jacket, sleeveless purple shirt, form fitting jeans, purple bra, purple panties.

Carmen Valdez: A petite Latina, Carmen is the thrill seeker of the group. She likes driving fast cars, bungee jumping and whatever else to get her adrenalin fix. Her body is on the smaller side, with b-cup boobs. And while she has a nice ass, it isn't as shapely as Tanya's.
Clothing: tennis shoes, socks, red sweater, white cotton tanktop, jeans, red bra, red panties.

         However, these four girls are not entirely alone in the house. There is one other occupant. This person was not invited to the slumber party, but they are about to become involved in ways they never would have imagined. This person's name is...

Michael Jacobson: Kaylee's younger brother. Michael is 16 and a sophomore in high school. He and Kaylee get along but don't spend much time together. Michael is much more focused on his future than having fun. Michael is well-read, but not a total shut-in. He can be distracted, it's just not as easy as with some guys.
Clothing: tennis shoes, socks, open button up shirt, t-shirt, jeans, boxers.

Tyler Jacobson: Kaylee's much younger brother. At nine years old, Tyler has just started middle school. He's only just starting to notice girls, and even still he's very confused about the whole thing.
Clothing: baseball cap, tennis shoes, socks, t-shirt, jeans, briefs.

Alyssa Jacobson: Kaylee's younger sister. Alyssa is 15 and a freshman in high school. While her sister went the popular sociable route, Alyssa became something more of a nerd. Alyssa is a gamer and geeky trivia buff. She's sarcastic and laid back, but can be rattled by embarrassing situations.
Clothing: zip-up hoodie, tennis shoes, socks, t-shirt, jeans, sky blue bra, sky blue panties.

Amanda Jacobson: Kaylee's much younger sister. At eight years old, Amanda is still in third grade. She's entirely innocent to the erotic undertones of the game. She idolizes her older sister and wants to be just like her when she grows up.
Clothing: baby Nikes, socks, choker, overalls, t-shirt, panties.

Noriko Yamada: A Japanese exchange student living at Kaylee's house, Noriko is extremely shy, but also extremely nice and friendly. Being highly introverted, she doesn't make friends easily, but she can be determined when she sets her mind to something.
Clothing: black shoes, white socks, blue cardigan, white blouse, plaid skirt, white cotton bra, white cotton panties.
1.title: On a night like any other...

11.content:
Michael Jacobson sits alone in his room, studying for an English final he has at the end of the week. Things have been going well so far, and he sees no reason that he won't do well when the time comes. He knows his sister is having people over, her usual friends most likely. He plans to stay out of her way, and just let them do their thing. Sure, they might be cute, but whatever they're doing it probably isn't even worth bothering about. He has other things to do, after all.

         Michael is not a bad looking guy. His family has good genes. Of course, his social star has always been eclipsed by his sister's. Not that he's ever cared, the limelight was never something Michael shot for. He and his sister simply had different priorities.

         Suddenly, the sound of breaking glass comes from downstairs, and Michael is shaken from his studying stupor. Thinking he should probably see what happened and if everyone is okay, Michael leaves his room and heads down the staircase to the living room.

         His father's card table sits at the center of the room, and his sister's three friends; Zoe, Tanya and Carmen sit around it. Kaylee is nearby, sweeping the shards of a broken glass into a dustpan.

         "What happened?" He asks, vaguely concerned.

         "Oh...hey, Mike. It's nothing. Just dropped this stupid glass. It's already taken care of, no need to go bitching about making a mess while the folks are away," Kaylee replies.

         "Hey I wasn't going to bitch. Just checking in," He finishes.

         "Heeey, Mikey," Zoe says, with a flirty grin his way. He begins to wonder what's up with the cards and the card table.

         "So...what are you guys up to tonight, anyway?" He asks.

         "Oh...well...we-" Kaylee stammers.

         "We're playing strip poker!" Zoe says excitedly, before breaking into giggles.

         He feels his eyebrows shoot up in spite of himself. That certainly wasn't the answer Michael expected. Unbidden, images of his sister and her friends and various states of undress fly through his mind. He inwardly curses. How is he supposed to focus on his studies when he knows that a floor below women are slowly getting undressed?

         "You knooow..." Zoe says wistfully. "You could join us if you want, Mikey."

         "What!?" Kaylee says. "You want to play strip poker with my brother!?"

         "Well, he may be your brother, Kay, but to me he is just a boy, and frankly this game could use a little extra flavor. I mean, sure seeing you girls naked sounds like all kinds of fun, but I think I'd be even more interested with the prospect of throwing a dick into the mix," Zoe says, grinning. Michael feels himself blush a bit.

         "Yeah, I think I'm going to second Zoe's motion here. We need a guy in here!" Carmen adds. Kaylee looks at Tanya.

         "Hey, don't look at me. This wasn't my idea, and if we're going to do this whole stereotypical strip poker thing, I don't see why we shouldn't invite a guy," Tanya says.

         "Well...it looks like I've been outvoted. Mike, the chair is there if you want it. Just try not to stare too much," Kaylee says somewhat reluctantly, pointing out an empty seat as she sits down.

         Michael isn't entirely sure what to think. There's no way he could go back to studying now. Not with this on the brain. Feeling a bit nervous, Michael sits down at the chair to the cheers of Zoe and Carmen. The cards are handed out and Michael looks at his hand.

Hand: 10 (clubs), 6 (spades), Jack (spades), 10 (diamonds), 8 (clubs)

Clothing Remaining: tennis shoes, socks, open button up shirt, t-shirt, jeans, boxers.
11.title: Michael Jacobson

111.content:
Michael's draw is a nominal improvement from a pair of 10s with a Jack kicker to a pair of 10s with a Ace kicker. He sighs since there doesn't seem to be much game-play to concern himself with. Maybe I'll opt out early. Or just throw the game. So what if Kaylee's friends so my baloney pony.

"Not much. Does the loser get to pick what they discard?" Michael asks in a defeatist tone.

Kaylee looks over the cards with a grimace. "Yes. But you're not the loser. Or at least you don't have the lowest hand."

MIchael checks everyone's hand and sees she is right. Kaylee has a busted inside straight and flush draw and everyone else has at least a pair.

MIchael lightly grins. "Okay. I'll be right back."

He gets up and leaves before anyone could say anything except for Tanya. "No cameras, if that's what you're going for, Mike."

Carmen smiles mischievously. "I don't think we can rule them out. But no point until we at least get to the undies."

Kalyee clears her throat. "I think I'll lose my shoes. I'm the stripper, so we're all good in establishing a pair of shoes and socks as one article, right?"

"Okay." Carmen said and the other two nod. Kaylee decides to make taking it off as interesting as possible by having Zoe take off her shoes as Mike came back with his English notebook.

"I'd object to your studying during the game, but as long as its when I"m not stripping, I'm okay with it," Zoe said to the returning Jacobson sibling.

Kaylee sits back down. "And don't slow the game," she added as the cards are dealt.

"Yes, ma'am," he answered and dog-ears a page to check his hand and his eyes widen.

Hand: King (hearts), 2 (hearts), King (spades), 8 (hearts), King (diamonds)

Clothing Remaining: tennis shoes, socks, open button up shirt, t-shirt, jeans, boxers
111.title: Keep the pair of 10s

1111.content:
No brainer, here Michael mused and mucked the 2 and 8. He came up with a insignificant Jack and 9.

"I think I'm good. Ladies, do we want to change over to involve some betting besides just one item?"

Kaylee shook her head. "Maybe after this game if it goes fast. And I'm saying that with a monster." She tabled 7 high straight while beaming.

Tanya glanced around, having already at your two hands, having already put down two pair of Queens and Deuces. "I agree, at least for now."

Zoe and Carmen playful stared at each other as they waited for the other to show their cards. Michael sighed and looked at his notes.

"I've got a middle pair," Carmen finally said and tabled a pair of 8s.

Zoe sighed and mucked her cards. "I'll follow fearless leader's lead." She said and discarded her high heeled shoes.

The cards were given out and Michael checked the situation.

Hand: Ace (diamonds), 3 (hearts), 3 (diamonds), 2 (clubs), 5 (clubs)
1111.title: Keep the 3 Kings

11112.content:
Out go the ace, two and five. Michael takes three cards in their stead. A king, a jack, and another king. Great! A two pair. This should be enough not to end up at the bottom. Michael smiled meekly as he watched the girls take their cards, examining them.

Kaylee seemed to be in a good mood. "Well, I'm off the hook for this round. Three fours!"

"Woohoo! Yes" Zoe exclaimed in jubilee as she laid down her straight 3 through 7. "Straight, baby!"

Michael started to get a little nervous as he still had the lowest hand with a two pair of kings and threes.

"I got two pair," Michael said as he dropped his cards in front of him.

"Pair of twos" Carmen muttered. "Maybe someone has a bust"

"That would be me," Tanya said as she laid out her cards with a mock-sad expression. "Ace high". She unceremoniously kicked off her tennis shoes and tossed them to the other side of the room.

"Next hand!"

Michael tosses out everything but the king and grabs four cards in return. More crap. Even worse than before. A ten, a nine, a four and a two.

The ladies laid out their cards. Zoe and Tanya had very impressive hands, two pairs each. Carmen got away with a pair of twos and both Michael and Kaylee had nothing. But of course, Michael's card was worse.

Another messed up hand. Only the ace seemed decent. Michael threw away the rest of the cards and grabbed another four from the deck. Not much of an improvement. A king, nine, five and a three grimaced at him.

Two other pairs were revealed quickly after. Both Kaylee and Tanya managed to scrape a pair of twos and fours respectively.

1112.content:
Michael knows the heart draw is foolhardy, but given that all he has to do is not have the worse hand, king high might be enough anyway. He waits for the dealing to finish and then flips his held and new cards up.

Almost perversely, he had been dealt another 2 and 8 to replace his three of a kind with a two pair. "I'm good," he said and opened his notebook again.

Zoe chuckled. "Kaylee, I think your brother must be the calmest guy to ever play strip poker with four girls."

Kaylee snorted. "Always looking ahead, Mikey. He is studious, but he might also be angling for some of you to try to attract his attention."

Tanya frowned as she finished checking the hands and lost with a pair of 3s. "Well, I'm not planning to give lap dances." She quickly took off her white jacket as the hands were dealt by Carmen.

1121.content:
While a pair of threes isn't a very good hand, Michael felt like it was at least safe than going for the flush. And it turns out he's right as he draws a 5(spades) 10 (diamonds) and 7 (hearts). This left Michael with a pair of threes he was certain he was about to lose with, but Zoe came up with nothing but a Queen high and removed the other heel.

"I guess this just isn't my night" Zoe says with yet another wink in Michael's direction. She then stretches out one of her legs and strokes your still pants covered knee with her stocking cover foot.

Zoe's flirting was actually getting a little strong and Michael was becoming uncomfortable. Fortunately (or unfortunately I guess, depending on your perspective), his sister seemed equally unnerved with the long pause. "Are you going to deal or not? We're still in the middle of a game."

Zoe retracts her leg and picks up the cards. "Calm down Kaylee, this is supposed to be fun, remember?"

"I am having fun, things are just taking a very long time, not everyone is into this waiting game as much as you are."

"I agree, this is taking a while," Carmen stated back, getting a bit bored. This game probably seemed a lot riskier to her at the beginning.

"Just wait until we get to later in the game," Tanya replied. "Then we'll see just how much you miss being bored."

Carmen snorts, "I haven't lost a hand yet. I think Carmen should be the most worried. Not that Carmen would be."

Carmen deals out the cards and Michael snatches them up. He was finding it a bit harder to find something to say. He was beginning to feel pretty uncomfortable around these women, and was starting to wonder if he should've just kept studying. He considered opting out, but he wasn't going to look like a wimp. Besides, when else might he get the chance to see a room full of naked women (and his sister, he remembered, which did damper the fantasy a lot).

"Hey, Michael, you taking any cards or what?"

Wow, he got so lost in his head, he forgot to check.

Through some kind of cosmic practical joke, everyone else managed to do better. Kaylee pulls a full house, threes over twos. Zoe snagged a king high flush of hearts. Tanya a queen high flush of diamonds. And Carmen has three fours.

Michael sulks as he removes his left shoe. It is still early in the game though. The girls seem eager to keep going now that the one guy is losing clothing too and Kaylee reshuffles and deals fast. Playing it safe didn't work too well for Michael last time, so now, he goes for the spade flush. It's risky, but it's not much riskier than the heart flush. Unfortunately, what he draws doesn't get him either way, as he pulls a spade (4), a heart (6), and then a king (diamonds). Well, at least now he knows it wouldn't've matter no matter what he'd gone for, and now he has a king high instead of a jack high. That would just have to do.

And it does seem to pull through as the others reveal their cards. Carmen had managed to pull an ace high club flush, but it was wasted this round as the entire rest of the group had nothing. But, with only a mere 8 high, Kaylee had the nothingest of nothings and removed her other shoe.

"Ok," said Kaylee. "Now that things are heating up, how about this? All paired items must be removed together from now on."

This caused a bit of a stir at the table.

"You're just saying that cause you and Zoe are completely shoeless now."

"Yeah, but we still take a hit on our socks. It will speed the game up slightly, but not too much. Everyone wins."

"What about Michael, he's only got one shoe."

Michael ponders this for a second, and decides he's with his sister on this. The game was taking too long. He undoes his other shoe and kicks it off.

"Now everyone's even."

A vote is taken, but the shoeless out rank the shoed and the motion passes. Tanya grumbles to herself, while Carmen gets over it pretty quickly. She was getting anxious at this point. Carmen then takes the cards and deals them out.

Suddenly she heard a loud crash of glass coming from below, followed by a cacophony of shrieks and arguments from who she guessed were the perpetrators, she took off her headphones and walked out of her room in a huff.

"But you-" Carmen started, stopping herself when Zoe stuck out her hand and shook her head. Kaylee rolled her eyes dramatically but the rest of the girls just chuckled. Amanda really was adorable.

"And I got the highest hand, so I choose what you lose. So I choose your plaid skirt. So please hand it over, Noriko." exclaimed a grinning Zoe.

"Zoe, pick something else!" declared Kaylee. "It's not like Zoe is a stranger to pantie clad girls! Remember your little private game with Alyssa?" teased Carmen. "Shut it!" responded Zoe, her face a darker shade than her hair. "What happened between you and Alyssa?" demanded Kaylee. Noriko felt relief that the focus was off her skirt...until Zoe burst into tears.

"Zoe! It's just a joke! Don't cry!" pleaded Carmen. "Why doesn't she want me?" blubbered Zoe. Noriko felt shame that she didn't just hand over her skirt. While she certainly didn't want to expose herself, she didn't want to see poor Zoe in such a state. Kaylee wrapped her arms around Zoe, who just bawled, clutching at her friend. "Zoe has always had a crush on Kaylee's sister Alyssa!" whispered Tanya to Noriko.

"Tell me what happened please, Zoe!" requested Kaylee. "It...it was two weeks ago. I invited Alyssa over when my parents were away. Alyssa got her friend Greta to cover for her. Greta's sister Inge told your parents that Alyssa was with them. We played about 3 games of strip poker. I ended up naked each time. My forfeits were 10 gentle swats, a quick rub and photos. The last time as Alyssa took photos of me....I rose and kissed her. She kissed back. She deleted the phones and offered herself to me. She was my first. I think...no I know that I was hers. It was just like in the stories or rumours. She told me as I cuddled up to her...that tonight was about us. But it was likely that when she left for home tomorrow, that would be it. I was shattered, but recovered quickly. I....I have been crushing on her for 2 years, I wasn't about to let go so easily! I spent the day, trying to win her back. A few times, I thought I had. But then I lost her. And since then, I've been trying to deal! I...I know you want more details. I...I'm just not ready to give the full story! Guys, I'm not a lesbian! I really do like guys...I just like Alyssa way more! I...I..." Zoe stammered again, before Noriko declared "Here!"

Zoe turned, tears blinking to her. "W-What?" "It's my skirt. You won, I lost. Please take it!" offered Noriko, face heating up. Zoe's eyes watered as she gave Noriko a hug. "Thank you, Noriko! Sorry about the flirting, I just thought....maybe I..." "You thought maybe it would help you forget Alyssa." concluded Noriko, feeling a little exposed by the fact her cotton underthings were visible. "Sorry for being a bitch, Zoe!" apologised Carmen. "Me too! Sorry Kaylee, but Alyssa is a cow for experimenting like that with Zoe!" exclaimed Tanya. "I still want her!" stuttered a weepy Zoe. "I love my sister, Zoe. But she was wrong to do this. I hope we are cool." stated Kaylee. "Thank you guys! It means a lot! And thanks for still playing Noriko!" "Shinpai nai! Do not worry! We are friends and I will play, even if I risk my underwear!" declared Noriko. Zoe beamed, a little more confidently. "You will lose your panties, when I win the next round, Nori!"

Noriko looked at her cards after Carmen dealt them. She had a healthy blend of Garnet, Bloodstone but also a Carnelian. Should she risk getting a weaker card?

A piddling score of 196. Tanya was the only one who picked up, all 5 cards. She wondered what she should do?

15122.content:
Noriko had a working knowledge of draw poker, and knew that sometimes Ace King was enough to win a hand, and if she paired either she could avoid losing the hand. After she dealt the others their cards she saw she had gained a 3 and a 9, making her frown momentarily.

As she looked up, she saw her table mates were already revealing their hands. Kaylee looked to have the strongest with a set of Jacks. After her was Tanya with a pair of 9s. Third so far went to Carmen with a pair of 4s.

Noriko looked timidly at Zoe, who had yet to show her hand. "Noriko, I see your one article of clothing, and I raise you two," Zoe said coolly.

Noriko looked away and was about to fold when the host intervened. "Zoe, knock it off. There's no betting or bluffing here. Lowest hand strips," Kaylee said and turned over Zoe's hand. She had a 2, 5, 6, 7, T.

Zoe shrugged. "M'kay. What should I lose, Kay?"

Kaylee mimicked Zoe's gesture. "Surprise us. And someone start shuffling... please."

Zoe smiled and brought her hands inside her silk shirt. With impressive speed she unhook her bra, slipped it off her shoulders, and pulled it out. She waved it around like a slingshot before fling it at Tanya.

Tanya and Noriko blushed while Carmen chuckled and dealt the cards. Kaylee rolled her eyes, grabbed the hot pink bra from Tanya and tossed it away. "I can't take you anywhere," she chastised the buxom, braless redhead.

Noriko, still blushing, checked her cards.

info.brief_description: Kaylee Jacobson is hosting a strip poker game at her party. Somehow you get involved.
info.description:
This is an interactive fiction story about a game of strip poker taking place during a girl's slumber party. Readers will take on the role of one of five different characters and then find themselves playing with the other girls. The goal of the game is to get everybody but the "player character" naked, as the last person with clothes left wins.

Should the "player" lose their clothes and be rendered naked, it's treated like a "game over" in a video game. The player's character will then be humiliated in any number of ways, such as being made to streak, pose for photos, made to masturbate or even be sexually dominated. And those are just ideas off the top of my head. Keep in mind those are supposed to be bad ends, though, not threads, so make sure that if the player does lose, it's a one chapter ending.

General Rules for Additions:

1. No torture or death. This is a fun sexy story, please keep it that way. A little light bondage is fine, and obviously should the player character lose, having their punishment be forced on them is a totally viable option, so long as it doesn't get too extreme.

2. Nothing scatological. Please no urine, excrement, farting, diapers or anything of the sort.

3. Nothing fantastical. This story is grounded in reality, so please no growth/shrinking, futa, gender-swapping, mind control, vore or anything like that.

4. Show the whole game. So please no time skips over events, or ending the game early. The strip poker game is what the story is supposed to be about.

5. One article at a time please. The lowest hand takes something off, and no one else.

Thanks :)
